summary: Defines a protocol that specifies the essential interface for Dask collection objects, including methods to expose their computational graph, unique token, and key set, as well as convenience operations for executing, persisting, and visualizing the computation.
business_intent: Provide a standardized contract so that different Dask collection implementations can be used interchangeably for lazy parallel computation, result materialization, and workflow visualization within dataâ€‘processing pipelines.
